about_the_game: Evan is an AI graduate student who dreams to make a new generation of androids capable of eliminating human limitations and suppressing the world's inequality. Being about to live with 3 robots for a period of time, this is the opportunity to understand how robots' minds are projected and how they interpret all different types of experiences. But a question circles his mind: is it possible to teach a machine the meaning of human love?

content_descriptors.notes: Baradroid contains revealing outfits, sexual stimulation, sexual innuendo, sex-related language, masturbation, and explicit sexual scenes. It's a game destined for adult players.

detailed_description: Evan is an AI graduate student who dreams to make a new generation of androids capable of eliminating human limitations and suppressing the world's inequality. Being about to live with 3 robots for a period of time, this is the opportunity to understand how robots' minds are projected and how they interpret all different types of experiences. But a question circles his mind: is it possible to teach a machine the meaning of human love?
name: Baradroid - A Gay Visual Novel Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: A choice-driven, high-tech, gay visual novel! Choose your baradroid, Live with him, and... Can you teach a robot the meaning of human love?
